The state boasts a diver (Read More)se range of bird sanctuaries that serve as vital habitats for indigenous and migratory species. From the lush greenery of Thattekad Bird Sanctuary to the tranquil Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary nestled amidst backwaters, each sanctuary contributes to Kerala's rich biodiversity. This introduction invites nature lovers and birdwatchers to embark on a captivating journey through Kerala's bird sanctuaries, where the symphony of bird calls and the vibrant hues of feathered residents create an immersive experience in the lap of nature. Here is the list of 10 Top Bird Sanctuaries in Kerala 1. Thattekad Bird Sanctuary Nestled in Ernakulam District, this sanctuary is a bird watcher's paradise, celebrated for its diverse avian population. Rich in biodiversity, it is home to rare species such as the Malabar grey hornbill and the Indian roller, offering a captivating glimpse into the region's ecological treasures.Timings: 7:00 AM - 5:00 PMLocation: Kothamangalam, Nyayapally PO, Pooyamkutty - Mankulam Rd, Thattekad, Kerala 686681 Read More 2. Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary Located in Kottayam district, this sanctuary is a serene haven for migratory birds, attracting species like Siberian storks and teals. The lush green landscape and the intricate network of lagoons make it a preferred destination for bird enthusiasts, providing a tranquil setting for nature lovers.Timings: 6:30 AM -4:30 PMLocation: Kavanattinkara, Kumarakom, Kerala 686563 Read More 3. Pathiramanal Bird Sanctuary Situated on an island in Vembanad Lake, this sanctuary boasts a tranquil environment and provides a refuge for various migratory birds, including pintails and common sandpipers. The island's unique topography further enhances the birdwatching experience, creating an idyllic spot for ornithological exploration.Timings: 8:00 AM - 5:30 PMLocation: J98M+VPQ, Muhamma, Kerala 688555 4. Neyyar Wildlife Sanctuary Recognized for its diverse wildlife, Neyyar in Thiruvananthapuram also harbors several bird species, offering a balanced ecosystem. Birdwatchers can spot endemic and migratory birds amidst the sanctuary's lush greenery, making it an ideal destination for those seeking a holistic natural experience.Timings: 9:00 AM -4:00 PMLocation: G5M2+J4C, Kallikkad, Kerala 695572 Read More Kerala Travel Packages Compare quotes from upto 3 travel agents for free 4 Nights / 5 Days 5 Days Munnar Thekkady Alleppey Tour Package Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) Sold By: 7c Destinations(4.9 ) ₹ 14,500 14% off ₹12,390/person Get Offers> 6 Nights / 7 Days Enchanting Kerala Getaway for 6 Nights Package Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Kumarakom(1N) → Kovalam(2N) ₹ 32,000 13% off ₹27,825/person Get Offers> 5 Nights / 6 Days Kerala Package Itinerary with Houseboat Experience Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) → Kochi(1N) ₹ 16,999 11% off ₹14,999/person Get Offers> 7 Nights / 8 Days Magical Kerala: Backwaters, Hill Stations, and Coastal Charms Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Kochi(1N) → Kanyakumari(1N) &ra... ₹ 32,460 11% off ₹28,700/person Get Offers> 5 Nights / 6 Days Amazing Kerala Packages for 6 Days Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) ₹9,999/person Get Offers> 6 Nights / 7 Days 7 Days Kerala Holiday Tour Package Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) → Kovalam(2N) ₹24,900/person Get Offers> View All Packages For Kerala View All Packages For Kerala 5. Kadalundi Bird Sanctuary Positioned in Malappuram district, this sanctuary is a crucial habitat for migratory birds, with its expansive mudflats and serene surroundings providing an ideal setting for species like terns and seagulls. The sanctuary's strategic location along the Kadalundi River estuary enhances its significance in the migratory bird conservation landscape.Timings: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PMLocation: Kadalundi Market Rd, Kadalundi, Kerala 673302 Read More 6. Mangalavanam Bird Sanctuary Located in the heart of Kochi, this ecologically sensitive area serves as a nesting ground for various bird species, including several endangered ones. Amidst the urban landscape, Mangalavanam provides a crucial refuge for migratory and resident birds, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of nature and urban development.Timings: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PMLocation: High Ct Rd, Marine Drive, Kochi, Ernakulam, Kerala 682031 Read More 7. Parambikulam Wildlife Sanctuary Primarily known for its diverse wildlife, this sanctuary in Palakkad district is also home to a variety of birds, enhancing its ecological significance. Visitors can witness an array of avian species thriving in the sanctuary's diverse ecosystems, making it a comprehensive destination for wildlife enthusiasts.Timings: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PMLocation: 9PM5+GC, Pariyaram, Kerala 678508 Read More 8. Chimmini Wildlife Sanctuary Situated in Thrissur district, this protected area is vital for the conservation of diverse flora and fauna, including an array of bird species. The sanctuary's pristine environment offers a glimpse into Kerala's rich biodiversity, inviting explorers to witness the delicate ecological balance.Timings: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PMLocation: CFJR+CC6, Chimmini Dam Road, Dist. Thrissur, Pariyaram, Kerala 680304 9. Aralam Wildlife Sanctuary While primarily dedicated to wildlife, this sanctuary in Kannur district accommodates different bird species, contributing to the region's ecological balance. Birdwatchers can explore the sanctuary's varied landscapes, adding an avian dimension to the sanctuary's overall natural diversity.Timings: 8:00 AM - 3:00 PM Read More 10. Peppara Wildlife Sanctuary Renowned for its wildlife, this sanctuary in Thiruvananthapuram district also provides a conducive habitat for various bird species. The sanctuary's diverse landscapes attract both wildlife enthusiasts and birdwatchers alike, offering a holistic experience for those seeking the beauty of Kerala's natural world.Timings: 10: 00 AM -
